original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our system configuration and development efforts, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective, efficient, and user-friendly system configurations. Your work will have a direct impact on the accuracy and performance of our systems, ensuring they accurately reflect business requirements and operate at optimal levels.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them clearly using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure comprehensive understanding
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively recommend and implement process improvements and system enhancements through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with stakeholders from various departments and backgrounds
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and familiarity with database querying and reporting

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java development, providing a deeper understanding of the technical implementation aspects
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their application in system configuration and optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis and technical configuration management
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective system configurations
- Experience in working with complex enterprise-level systems and collaborating cross-functionally

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, enabling efficient and iterative system development and deployment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, providing a relevant domain-specific understanding

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management tools
- SQL and data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, PowerBI, Tableau)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Google Suite)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and proactively to identify and resolve issues
- Flexibility to adapt to changing business requirements and technical needs
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business strategy and technical execution, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, technical proficiency, and strategic thinking. As a key member of our system configuration and development team, you will be responsible for aligning our [mention specific system] backend with the evolving needs of our business. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency, accuracy, and performance of our systems, ensuring they not only meet current requirements but also anticipate and adapt to future needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including business leaders, subject matter experts, and IT professionals, to deeply understand the organization's strategic objectives, operational processes, and data requirements
- Translate complex business needs into comprehensive, scalable, and user-friendly system configurations, leveraging your technical expertise to develop and maintain configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations
- Analyze existing data and system performance to identify opportunities for optimization, streamlining, and automation, utilizing advanced data analysis techniques and tools
- Proactively recommend and implement innovative solutions to improve business processes and system efficiency, incorporating best practices and industry trends
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements, function as expected, and seamlessly integrate with the broader technology ecosystem
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations, future enhancements, and knowledge transfer
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation, continuous support, and timely issue resolution

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business challenges and devise effective technical solutions
- Strong communication and interpersonal abilities to effectively translate technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders and build consensus across the organization
- Proficiency in SQL and experience in database querying, reporting, and data analysis
- Ability to think strategically and anticipate future business and technology trends

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java development, providing a deep understanding of the technical implementation aspects
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles and their potential applications in system configuration and optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5-7 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, technical configuration management, and strategic planning
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into scalable, high-performing system configurations
- Experience in working with enterprise-level systems and leading cross-functional initiatives

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices, enabling rapid and iterative system development and deployment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, providing relevant domain-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management tools
- SQL and advanced data analysis tools (e.g., Python, R, Tableau, Power BI)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Google Suite)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions and presentations
- Ability to work independently, think strategically, and proactively identify and resolve complex issues
- Flexibility to adapt to changing business requirements and emerging technology trends
- Strong attention to detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and a commitment to delivering high-quality, innovative solutions

Role Overview:
This role is a critical driver of business innovation and technological transformation, requiring a unique blend of technical expertise, strategic vision, and change management capabilities. As a key member of our system configuration and development team, you will be responsible for aligning our [mention specific system] backend with the organization's evolving business needs and long-term objectives. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency, agility, and competitive advantage of our systems, ensuring they not only meet current requirements but also anticipate and adapt to future industry trends and market demands.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including business leaders, subject matter experts, and IT professionals, to deeply understand the organization's strategic objectives, operational processes, and data requirements
- Translate complex business needs into innovative, scalable, and user-centric system configurations, leveraging your technical expertise to develop and maintain configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations
- Analyze existing data and system performance to identify opportunities for optimization, automation, and transformation, utilizing advanced data analysis techniques and tools to uncover insights and trends
- Proactively recommend and implement cutting-edge solutions to streamline business processes, enhance system efficiency, and drive continuous improvement, incorporating industry best practices and emerging technologies
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements, function as expected, and seamlessly integrate with the broader technology ecosystem, while also anticipating and mitigating potential risks and challenges
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations, future enhancements, and knowledge transfer
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation, continuous support, and timely issue resolution, while also fostering a culture of innovation and continuous learning

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business challenges and devise transformative technical solutions
- Highly effective communication and interpersonal abilities to effectively translate technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders, build consensus, and drive organizational change
- Proficiency in SQL and experience in advanced data analysis, including the use of tools like Python, R, and business intelligence platforms
- Ability to think strategically, anticipate future business and technology trends, and align technical solutions with the organization's long-term vision

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java development, providing a deep understanding of the technical implementation aspects and the ability to lead and mentor cross-functional teams
- Advanced knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) principles and their practical applications in system configuration, optimization, and automation

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7-10 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, technical configuration management, and strategic technology leadership
- Proven track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into innovative, scalable, and high-performing system configurations
- Experience in working with enterprise-level systems, leading cross-functional initiatives, and driving organizational transformation

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, DevOps practices, and Lean principles, enabling rapid and iterative system development and deployment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, providing relevant domain-specific knowledge and the ability to identify industry-specific opportunities for innovation

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management tools
- SQL, Python, R, and advanced data analysis tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Spark)
- Collaboration, documentation, and project management tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Google Suite)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions, presentations, and strategic planning sessions
- Ability to work independently, think strategically, and proactively identify and resolve complex, multifaceted issues
- Flexibility to adapt to changing business requirements, emerging technology trends, and industry disruptions
- Strong attention to detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and a commitment to delivering high-quality, innovative, and transformative solutions
- Demonstrated leadership abilities and a passion for driving organizational change and continuous improvement
